label: The Shadow Curse of the Raggedstone
column5: A rebellious monk from Little Malvern was ordered to crawl on hands and knees to the top of Raggedstone Hill as punishment
column6: ultimately cursing the hill's shadow to bring misfortune upon those it touched. The curse is said to have affected figures such as Cardinal Wolsey
column7: who experienced misfortune after the shadow fell upon him during his time as a tutor near Raggedstone.
